# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="d5f86-102">Lägga till emojier i e-postmeddelanden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d5f86-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d5f86-103">Du kan infoga emojier i dina meddelanden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d5f86-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d5f86-104">Svara på ett befintligt e-postmeddelande eller Välj **nytt meddelande**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d5f86-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d5f86-105">Välja knappen **Infoga emojier**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d5f86-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d5f86-106">längst ned i Skriv fönstret för att öppna fönstret uttryck.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d5f86-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d5f86-107">Sök efter och välj den emoji eller den GIF-filen du vill infoga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d5f86-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
